sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词都有"惊人的，奇异的，奇妙的"之意。
means: marvelous ： 语气较强，指人的行为超凡或事物的异常，几乎使人难以相信。
wonderful ： 指人或事物的罕见或新奇，出人意料。

sentence.Network_en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentence.Network_en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentence.Network_en: It sounds like a wonderful idea to me, does it really work?
sentence.Network_cn: 听起来这个主意很不错，真的能行吗？

PerfectNetExp.abs: 胜字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 胜利〖 victory〗 非常美好;美妙〖 wonderful〗 尽;完〖 exhausted;completely〗.
小学英语词汇大全（有中文释义） - 豆丁网 ... exciting 令人兴奋的 wonderful 精彩的，令人惊奇的 beautiful 漂亮的，美丽的.
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 443 foreign a. 外国的 446 wonderful a. 极好的,精彩的 447 holiday n. 假期,假日.
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 443 foreign a. 外国的 446 wonderful a. 极好的,精彩的 447 holiday n. 假期,假日.

list.abs: 奇字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 奇祸〖 unexpecteddisaster〗 奇迹〖 miracle;wonder〗 奇技〖 uncannyfeat〗.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... planet n 行星 wonder n 奇迹；惊奇 defeat vt 击败；战胜.

means.word_mean: 令人惊奇的;绝妙的;极好的

encyclopedia.content: Lady GaGa演唱歌曲 if i fell in love with you would you understand me, dear 亲爱的，我爱上你了，你明白我的感受吗？ love is weird 爱情是个怪东西 I colored you a valentine 我把你漆成爱情的颜色（这句值得好好考究） struggled just to stay inside the lines 拼命不让自己过界 I lose my mind 我迷失了 I really can't believe 我真不能相信 I lost myself again 我又迷失了 looking for something crazy beautiful lov

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as wonderful, you think they are extremely good.

example.ex: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face...
example.tran: 雾蒙蒙的寒冷空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

means.word_mean: 1. extraordinarily good; used especially as intensifiers;

auth_sentence.content: Sam was a loving husband and a wonderful father.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sam was a loving husband and a wonderful father.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sam was a loving husband and a wonderful father.

auth_sentence.content: Congratulations to Dr Benhur Lee and his wonderful team!
auth_sentence.res_content: Congratulations to Dr Benhur Lee and his wonderful team!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Congratulations to Dr Benhur Lee and his wonderful team!

auth_sentence.content: I have had wonderful success meeting men on line.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have had wonderful success meeting men on line.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have had wonderful success meeting men on line.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮

Sentence.sentence: That's because we have a wonderful sales manager ——you!
Yeah, that's right, but it's wonderful.
It is almost too wonderful not to try it.
Yeah, that's right, but it's wonderful.

means.word_mean: 极好的, 精彩的, 绝妙的

sentences.en: He told me a wonderful story.
sentences.cn: 他给我讲了个精彩的故事。

sentences.en: His skill is wonderful for his age.
sentences.cn: 他小小年纪, 技巧令人称奇。

sentences.en: It's wonderful to see you again!
sentences.cn: 再次见到你真是太好了！

sentences.en: How wonderful it was to be here with her!
sentences.cn: 和她一起在这里多好啊！

sentences.en: We've been having wonderful weather recently.

jushi.english: Shakespeare wrote many wonderful comic and tragic plays.
jushi.chinese: 莎士比亚写了很多精彩的喜剧和悲剧剧本。

jushi.english: Niagara Falls is a wonderful sight.
jushi.chinese: 尼亚加拉瀑布是美妙的景观。

jushi.english: What a wonderful performance it is!
